courses.title: Coded Agents Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn to build AI agents with UiPath: hands-on tutorials, sample projects, and educational resources for developing coded automation agents using Python, LangChain, and the UiPath SDK

courses.title: REFramework Advanced
courses.description: Advanced RPA patterns and architectures: master sophisticated automation strategies, error handling patterns, state machine design, and enterprise-scale RPA solutions beyond the standard REFramework
